['DescriptionLa Vie at Jumeirah Beach Residence (JBR) is a new development by Dubai Properties and will feature 1, 2, 3 & 4 bedroom apartments and penthouses. The fine location along with contemporary design will make way for you to live a very balanced lifestyle.
The exclusive waterfront development will boast of all the elements that enhance your living standard. Blending style with substance, the residences exude class and elegance. Offering panoramic views of the Arabian Gulf, Palm Jumeirah, Blue Waters and that of the sea, you will indeed be having a great time here.
Further, the meticulously planned residences, inspired by Miami modernist architecture, it does go a long to present you homes with resort-style living. In a way, every aspect is planned to make you feel part of a community, where you get to access an affluent lifestyle.
Being a resident, you will get direct access to a beach. In addition to these, you will be living close to some of the best in class hotels, boutiques, restaurants, and cafes.
Project Highlights:
•	New development offering luxury residences.
•	Choose from 1, 2 3, & 4 bedroom apartments & penthouses
•	Equipped with posh amenities and facilities
•	Stylish interiors and modern décor
•	Exclusive location in Jumeirah Beach Residence.
•	Access to the beach.
•	Spectacular views of the Arabian Gulf.
•	Near to prominent fine dining, retail and entertainment venues.
•	Round the clock security.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionLa Rosa by Dubai Holdings is a plush residential project located at Villanova in Dubai. Dubai Holdings is a reputed realty company in Dubai. These exceptionally beautiful villas are located in a serene area which is close to the city and it is just the mirror image of the beautiful Mediterranean lifestyle. It is just like as mall town within a city. A lovely place to be at. 
What are the key Details of the project?
You can opt for either 3 bedroom or 4 bedroom villas as a wide variety is available to choose from. The villas are well-equipped with world-class modern specifications to make you fall head over heels in love with these alluring houses. 
What are the amenities available here?
The range of amenities will surprise you as you will get almost everything modern and chic.The gated community provides security always. Lovely parks with perfect jogging tracks. A shopping centre to suffice your daily household needs. A huge play area for children, help them grow better, let them play. A community swimming pool where you can enjoy your leisure time. Well-equipped gymnasium to keep you in great shape. Beautifully landscaped gardens with paved compounds and car parking areas. 
Advantage of the location 
Location wise this place earns an extra brownie point because it is strategically located in near the junction of Emirates Road and Al Ain road. It takes 7 minutes to reach the Global village from this place. Within 15 minutes you will reach Dubai airport, just 18 minutes to Business Bay. It takes just 15 minutes to Down Town Dubai. This place is also close to well-known schools, colleges, hospitals,recreational areas, etc.

Community swimming pool
Gymnasium
Parks landscaped gardens and paved compounds
Car parking areas
Play area for children

Having spacious rooms, large balconies and lots of natural light Dorra Bay offers both affordable yet stylish living.Live in comfort and elegance choose Forest Real Estate."]
